<lb n="c57-0074__main__25"/><del loc="c57-0074__main__d1e12905__Start"/>smi<del loc="c57-0074__main__d1e12905__End"/>

<del loc="c57-0074__main__d1e12952__Start"/>acqu<del loc="c57-0074__main__d1e12952__End"/><lb n="c57-0074__main__32"/>resumed

<lb n="c57-0081__main__7"/>every day

<metamark function="insert">^</metamark>seriousuneasi<lb n="c57-0081__main__14"/>ness; Interpeet

<lb n="c57-0081__main__15"/>me
I conjure

<lb n="c57-0081__main__17"/><metamark function="insert">^</metamark>for sometime without

I
